TopicTitle: Will KSP 2 be supported or playable on Steam Deck

Articles.Content:
Hi everyone and KSP devs,

I'm getting a Steam Deck in a few weeks from now, and I was wondering whether KSP 2 will be available on said console at some point in time? I can't really afford a beefy PC currently so being able to play it on a console that small and that portable would be a godsend, along with possibly being able to connect  a keyboard and mouse to enhance the experience.

Thanks!

PD have said there will be no official optimization for the steam deck . I have a steam deck and find it fantastic and it runs KSP1 and Juno no problem which more than makes up for not being able to run the mess that is currently KSP2. See https://support.privatedivision.com/hc/en-us/articles/10601547732755--Kerbal-Space-Program-2-Will-the-game-be-optimized-for-Steam-Deck-
